message: Starting implementation - reading QuizInterface.jsx and data structure
Analyzed QuizInterface.jsx and data structure. Implementing explanation display feature now.
Implemented explanation display. Testing the build to verify no errors.

COMPLETED: QuizInterface.jsx explanation display feature implemented. Changes: (1) Added Lightbulb icon import at line 3, (2) Added explanation section at lines 162-180 showing after answer selection, (3) Displays explanation.correct for correct answers, (4) Displays explanation.incorrect[selectedOption] for wrong answers with fallback, (5) Amber/orange gradient styling for visual distinction, (6) Build verified successful - no errors. All requirements met.
